recipe.title: Coleslaw with Remoulade Dressing
ingredients: 1 2-pound green cabbage, quartered, cored, very thinly sliced (10 to 11 cups)
2 teaspoons coarse kosher salt, divided, plus more for seasoning
instructions: Place cabbage in large colander; place carrots in medium colander. Toss cabbage with 1 1/2 teaspoons coarse salt. Toss carrots with 1/2 teaspoon coarse salt. Let stand 1 hour, tossing occasionally. Drain both vegetables; transfer to large bowl. Whisk mayonnaise and all remaining ingredients in medium bowl. Season dressing to taste with coarse salt and pepper.
Drain any liquid from vegetables; toss with enough dressing to coat.
